text:
A new "%R" log format is added that formats the special characters \000-\037,  '"', 
'\\' in the format "\\%03o" so that that web clients cannot fool the log analysis tools 
into wrong file sizes, etc.
creator: roland@burse.uni-hamburg.de
slive@apache.org
text:
This isn't particularly useful on its own, since clients can just as
easily do funny things with other fields in the log (Referer,
User-Agent, etc).

I believe that Andre recently committed a more general fix.  Can anyone
confirm?

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
Yep, it's in 2.1 and proposed for backport. I'm not sure, whether it will go
into 2.0 soon (but I hope).
